title: Turkey-US relations hit all time low over Syria
text:
Turkey-US relations hit all time low over Syria 6:51am EST - 02:23 
U.S. officials say that Secretary of State Rex Tillerson expects to have difficult conversations during a visit to Turkey on Thursday and Friday, given that the NATO allies have starkly diverging interests in Syria.   
U.S. officials say that Secretary of State Rex Tillerson expects to have difficult conversations during a visit to Turkey on Thursday and Friday, given that the NATO allies have starkly diverging interests in Syria.  //reut.rs/2EIjAgA
